thread.title: Aidy Boothroyd named England under-21 manager on full-time basis
thread.title_full: Aidy Boothroyd named England under-21 manager on full-time basis

author: whaughton
title: Aidy Boothroyd named England under-21 manager on full-time basis
text:
Boothroyd New Lions boss Aidy Boothroyd named England under-21 manager on full-time basis 
Ex-Watford boss beats Paul Ince and Stuart Pearce to land role with Young Lions on a permanent deal Breaking Comments AIDY BOOTHROYD has been named England Under 21 boss on a full time basis, SunSport understands. 
The former Watford boss beats Paul Ince and Stuart Pearce to succeed Gareth Southgate who is now in charge of the senior side. PA:Press Association 1 Aidy Boothroyd has been in charge on an interim basis and get’s the gig full time 
Boothroyd is part of the FA fabric having worked there since 2014 at under-19 and under-20 level – and has worked in a caretaker role with the under-21s in the last two matches. 
The new manager will be given the task of leading the under-21 side in the European Championship in Poland this summer where they have been dran in the same group as the hosts, along with Slovakia and Sweden. 
More to follow…
